name: SpookySwap
description: SpookySwap is an automated market maker protocol on the Fantom network. It's a decentralized liquidity aggregator where users can add their assets to several different liquidity pools and earn fees.

en.name: SpookySwap
en.description: SpookySwap is an automated market maker protocol on the Fantom network. It's a decentralized liquidity aggregator where users can add their assets to several different liquidity pools and earn fees.

fr.name: SpookySwap
fr.description: SpookySwap est un protocole market maker automatisé sur le réseau Fantom. Il s'agit d'un agrégateur de liquidités décentralisé avec lequel les utilisateurs peuvent ajouter leurs actifs dans plusieurs pools de liquidités différentes et gagner une partie des frais.

es.name: SpookySwap
es.description: SpookySwap is an automated market maker protocol on the Fantom network. It's a decentralized liquidity aggregator where users can add their assets to several different liquidity pools and earn fees.

de.name: SpookySwap
de.description: SpookySwap ist ein automatisiertes Market-Maker-Protokoll im Fantom-Netzwerk. Es ist ein dezentraler Liquiditätsaggregator, bei dem Nutzer ihre Vermögenswerte zu verschiedenen Liquiditätspools hinzufügen und Gebühren verdienen können.

pt.name: SpookySwap
pt.description: SpookySwap é um protocolo AMM na rede Fantom. É um agregador descentralizado de liquidez onde os usuários podem adicionar seus ativos em diferentes pools de liquidez e receber taxas por isto.

el.name: SpookySwap
el.description: SpookySwap is an automated market maker protocol on the Fantom network. It's a decentralized liquidity aggregator where users can add their assets to several different liquidity pools and earn fees.

tr.name: SpookySwap
tr.description: SpookySwap, Fantom ağındaki otomatikleştirilmiş bir piyasa yapıcı protokolüdür. Kullanıcıların varlıklarını birkaç farklı likidite havuzuna ekleyebilecekleri ve ücret kazanabilecekleri merkezi olmayan bir likidite toplayıcıdır.

vi.name: SpookySwap
vi.description: SpookySwap is an automated market maker protocol on the Fantom network. It's a decentralized liquidity aggregator where users can add their assets to several different liquidity pools and earn fees.

zh.name: SpookySwap
zh.description: SpookySwap 是个在 Fantom 网络上的自动做市商协议。它是个去中心化的流动性聚合器。用户可以将他们的资产添加到各个不同的流动性池中以赚取费用。

hi.name: SpookySwap
hi.description: SpookySwap, Fantom नेटवर्क पर एक स्वचालित बाजार निर्माता प्रोटोकॉल है। यह एक विकेन्द्रीकृत तरलता एग्रीगेटर है जहां उपयोगकर्ता अपनी संपत्ति को कई अलग-अलग तरलता पूल में जोड़ सकते हैं और शुल्क कमा सकते हैं।

ja.name: SpookySwap
ja.description: SpookySwapはFantomネットワーク上の自動マーケットメーカープロトコルです。分散型流動性アグリゲーターであり、ユーザーは自分の資産をいくつかの異なる流動性プールに追加し手数料を得ることができます。

id.name: SpookySwap
id.description: SpookySwap is an automated market maker protocol on the Fantom network. It's a decentralized liquidity aggregator where users can add their assets to several different liquidity pools and earn fees.
